text: The elder [strongs id="g4245" /] unto the wellbeloved [strongs id="g0027" /] Gaius [strongs id="g1050" /], whom [strongs id="g3739" /] I [strongs id="g1473" /] love [strongs id="g0025" m="PresActInd" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] the truth [strongs id="g0225" /].

Beloved [strongs id="g0027" /], I wish [strongs id="g2172" m="PresMidPasDepInd" /] above [strongs id="g4012" /] all things [strongs id="g3956" /] that thou [strongs id="g4571" /] mayest prosper [strongs id="g2137" m="PresPasInf" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] be in health [strongs id="g5198" m="PresActInf" /], even as [strongs id="g2531" /] thy [strongs id="g4675" /] soul [strongs id="g5590" /] prospereth [strongs id="g2137" m="PresPasInd" /].

For [strongs id="g1063" /] I rejoiced [strongs id="g5463" m="Aor2PasDepInd" /] greatly [strongs id="g3029" /], when the brethren [strongs id="g0080" /] came [strongs id="g2064" m="PresMidPasDepPtc" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] testified [strongs id="g3140" m="PresActPtc" /] of the truth [strongs id="g0225" /] that is in thee [strongs id="g4675" /], even as [strongs id="g2531" /] thou [strongs id="g4771" /] walkest [strongs id="g4043" m="PresActInd" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] the truth [strongs id="g0225" /].

I have [strongs id="g2192" m="PresActInd" /] no [strongs id="g3756" /] greater [strongs id="g3186" /] [strongs id="g5130" /] joy [strongs id="g5479" /] than to [strongs id="g2443" /] hear [strongs id="g0191" m="PresActSubj" /] that my [strongs id="g1699" /] children [strongs id="g5043" /] walk [strongs id="g4043" m="PresActPtc" /] in [strongs id="g1722" /] truth [strongs id="g0225" /].

Beloved [strongs id="g0027" /], thou doest [strongs id="g4160" m="PresActInd" /] faithfully [strongs id="g4103" /] whatsoever [strongs id="g3739" /] [strongs id="g1437" /] thou doest [strongs id="g2038" m="AorMidDepSubj" /] to [strongs id="g1519" /] the brethren [strongs id="g0080" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] to [strongs id="g1519" /] strangers [strongs id="g3581" /];

Which [strongs id="g3739" /] have borne witness [strongs id="g3140" m="AorActInd" /] of thy [strongs id="g4675" /] charity [strongs id="g0026" /] before [strongs id="g1799" /] the church [strongs id="g1577" /]: whom [strongs id="g3739" /] if thou bring forward on their journey [strongs id="g4311" m="AorActPtc" /] after [strongs id="g0516" /] a godly [strongs id="g2316" /] sort [strongs id="g0516" /], thou shalt do [strongs id="g4160" m="FutActInd" /] well [strongs id="g2573" /]:

Because that [strongs id="g1063" /] for [strongs id="g5228" /] his [strongs id="g0846" /] nameâ€™s [strongs id="g3686" /] sake [strongs id="g5228" /] they went forth [strongs id="g1831" m="Aor2ActInd" /], taking [strongs id="g2983" m="PresActPtc" /] nothing [strongs id="g3367" /] of [strongs id="g0575" /] the Gentiles [strongs id="g1484" /].

We [strongs id="g2249" /] therefore [strongs id="g3767" /] ought [strongs id="g3784" m="PresActInd" /] to receive [strongs id="g0618" m="PresActInf" /] such [strongs id="g5108" /], that [strongs id="g2443" /] we might be [strongs id="g1096" m="PresMidPasDepSubj" /] fellowhelpers [strongs id="g4904" /] to the truth [strongs id="g0225" /].

I wrote [strongs id="g1125" m="AorActInd" /] unto the church [strongs id="g1577" /]: but [strongs id="g0235" /] Diotrephes [strongs id="g1361" /], who [strongs id="g3588" /] loveth to have the preeminence [strongs id="g5383" m="PresActPtc" /] among them [strongs id="g0846" /], receiveth [strongs id="g1926" m="PresMidPasDepInd" /] us [strongs id="g2248" /] not [strongs id="g3756" /].

Wherefore [strongs id="g1223" /] [strongs id="g5124" /], if [strongs id="g1437" /] I come [strongs id="g2064" m="Aor2ActSubj" /], I will remember [strongs id="g5279" m="FutActInd" /] his [strongs id="g0846" /] deeds [strongs id="g2041" /] which [strongs id="g3739" /] he doeth [strongs id="g4160" m="PresActInd" /], prating against [strongs id="g5396" m="PresActPtc" /] us [strongs id="g2248" /] with malicious [strongs id="g4190" /] words [strongs id="g3056" /]: and [strongs id="g2532" /] not [strongs id="g3361" /] content [strongs id="g0714" m="PresPasPtc" /] therewith [strongs id="g1909" /] [strongs id="g5125" /], neither [strongs id="g3777" /] doth [strongs id="g1926" /] he himself [strongs id="g0846" /] receive [strongs id="g1926" m="PresMidPasDepInd" /] the brethren [strongs id="g0080" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] forbiddeth [strongs id="g2967" m="PresActInd" /] them that would [strongs id="g1014" m="PresMidPasDepPtc" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] casteth [strongs id="g1544" m="PresActInd" /] [them] out of [strongs id="g1537" /] the church [strongs id="g1577" /].

Beloved [strongs id="g0027" /], follow [strongs id="g3401" m="PresMidPasDepImpr" /] not [strongs id="g3361" /] that which is evil [strongs id="g2556" /], but [strongs id="g0235" /] that which is good [strongs id="g0018" /]. He that doeth good [strongs id="g0015" m="PresActPtc" /] is [strongs id="g2076" m="PresInd" /] of [strongs id="g1537" /] God [strongs id="g2316" /]: but [strongs id="g1161" /] he that doeth evil [strongs id="g2554" m="PresActPtc" /] hath [strongs id="g3708" /] not [strongs id="g3756" /] seen [strongs id="g3708" m="PerfActInd" /] God [strongs id="g2316" /].

Demetrius [strongs id="g1216" /] hath good report [strongs id="g3140" m="PerfPasInd" /] of [strongs id="g5259" /] all [strongs id="g3956" /] [men], and [strongs id="g2532" /] of [strongs id="g5259" /] the truth [strongs id="g0225" /] itself [strongs id="g0846" /]: yea [strongs id="g1161" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] we [strongs id="g2249" /] [also] bear record [strongs id="g3140" m="PresActInd" /]; and [strongs id="g2532" /] ye know [strongs id="g1492" m="PerfActInd" /] that [strongs id="g3754" /] our [strongs id="g2257" /] record [strongs id="g3141" /] is [strongs id="g2076" m="PresInd" /] true [strongs id="g0227" /].

I had [strongs id="g2192" m="ImpfActInd" /] many things [strongs id="g4183" /] to write [strongs id="g1125" m="PresActInf" /], but [strongs id="g0235" /] I will [strongs id="g2309" m="PresActInd" /] not [strongs id="g3756" /] with [strongs id="g1223" /] ink [strongs id="g3188" /] and [strongs id="g2532" /] pen [strongs id="g2563" /] write [strongs id="g1125" m="AorActInf" /] unto thee [strongs id="g4671" /]:

But [strongs id="g1161" /] I trust [strongs id="g1679" m="PresActInd" /] I shall [strongs id="g1492" /] shortly [strongs id="g2112" /] see [strongs id="g1492" m="Aor2ActInf" /] thee [strongs id="g4571" /], and [strongs id="g2532" /] we shall speak [strongs id="g2980" m="FutActInd" /] face [strongs id="g4750" /] to [strongs id="g4314" /] face [strongs id="g4750" /]. Peace [strongs id="g1515" /] [be] to thee [strongs id="g4671" /]. [Our] friends [strongs id="g5384" /] salute [strongs id="g0782" m="PresMidPasDepInd" /] thee [strongs id="g4571" /]. Greet [strongs id="g0782" m="PresMidPasDepImpr" /] the friends [strongs id="g5384" /] by [strongs id="g2596" /] name [strongs id="g3686" /].
